about_the_game:
This is a stand-alone indie game demo version, currently only contains exploration gameplay. In the official version, players can explore the spaceship, collect items, destroy alien monsters, and rescue aliens. The spacecraft is 1 km in diameter, with a 1 km diameter circular simulated gravity zone inside, there is plenty of room for exploration. The ship is located in low Earth orbit, and players can enjoy the scenery of space, the movement of the moon and the Earth.

Gameplay introduction:

Press W to move forward, S to move back, A to move left, D to move right, Shift to sprint when moving. Press the space bar to jump and the F key to interact. Move the mouse to rotate the field of view.

Key features:

Exploration map

Game story background introduction:

In 2081, human beings received a help signal from aliens, and alien spacecraft were attacked and infected by alien monsters (temporarily using cones, squares, and planes to represent alien monsters). You, the great warrior, have been entrusted by the United Nations to embark on a strange alien ship, destroy alien monsters, rescue aliens, and send them to settle in a mysterious part of the Earth. If you can destroy the remaining alien monsters, the aliens promise to give you this ship.

name: First contact Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: intel Core i5-13490F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4060ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: This is a stand-alone indie game demo version. Currently, players are only free to explore different areas of the ship. In the future, the function of collecting different items and fighting with alien monsters will be introduced.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
